titles.title: To amend the Appalachian Regional Development Act of 1965 to include additional counties in the State of Mississippi as part of the Appalachian region.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Public Works + Transportation.

committee.name: House Committee on Public Works + Transportation

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Economic Development.

bill.summary: 7/12/1994--Introduced. Amends the Appalachian Regional Development Act of 1965 to include Carroll, Grenada, and Montgomery Counties in Mississippi as part of the Appalachian region for purposes of such Act.
